trans-unit.source: Cache variables
trans-unit.target: 缓存变量

trans-unit.source: Cache variables are inherited through the inherits field, and the preset’s variables will be the union of its own cacheVariables and the cacheVariables from all its parents. If multiple presets in this union define the same variable, the standard rules of inherits are applied. Setting a variable to null causes it to not be set, even if a value was inherited from another preset.
trans-unit.target: 缓存变量是通过“ inherits 字段继承的，并且预设变量将是其自己的 cacheVariables 和其所有父级的cacheVariables的并 cacheVariables 。如果此联合中的多个预设定义相同的变量，则将应用 inherits 的标准规则。将变量设置为 null 会导致即使设置值是从另一个预设继承的，也不会设置该变量。

trans-unit.source: Call the cmake_minimum_required() command at the beginning of the top-level CMakeLists.txt file even before calling the project() command. It is important to establish version and policy settings before invoking other commands whose behavior they may affect. See also policy CMP0000.
trans-unit.target: 即使在调用 project() 命令之前，也要在顶层 CMakeLists.txt 文件的开头调用 cmake_minimum_required() （）命令。在调用可能影响其行为的其他命令之前，建立版本和策略设置很重要。另请参阅策略 CMP0000 。

trans-unit.source: Call the project() command near the top of the top-level CMakeLists.txt, but after calling cmake_minimum_required(). It is important to establish version and policy settings before invoking other commands whose behavior they may affect. See also policy CMP0000.

trans-unit.source: Calling cmake_minimum_required() inside a function() limits some effects to the function scope when invoked. Such calls should not be made with the intention of having global effects.
trans-unit.target: 调用 cmake_minimum_required() 一个内部 function() 被调用时限制一些效果的功能范围。进行此类呼吁不应具有全球影响。

trans-unit.source: Calling PKGCONFIG will fill the desired information into the 4 given arguments, e.g. PKGCONFIG(libart-2.0 LIBART_INCLUDE_DIR LIBART_LINK_DIR LIBART_LINK_FLAGS LIBART_CFLAGS) if pkg-config was NOT found or the specified software package doesn’t exist, the variable will be empty when the function returns, otherwise they will contain the respective information

trans-unit.source: Calls to find_package(<PackageName>) will search in prefixes specified by the <PackageName>_ROOT CMake variable, where <PackageName> is the name given to the find_package() call and _ROOT is literal. For example, find_package(Foo) will search prefixes specified in the Foo_ROOT CMake variable (if set). See policy CMP0074.
trans-unit.target: 调用 find_package(<PackageName>) 将搜索由 <PackageName>_ROOT CMake变量指定的前缀，其中 <PackageName> 是为 find_package() 调用提供的名称，而 _ROOT 是文字。例如， find_package(Foo) 将搜索 Foo_ROOT CMake变量（如果设置）中指定的前缀。请参阅策略 CMP0074 。

trans-unit.source: Calls to find_package(<PackageName>) will search in prefixes specified by the <PackageName>_ROOT environment variable, where <PackageName> is the name given to the find_package() call and _ROOT is literal. For example, find_package(Foo) will search prefixes specified in the Foo_ROOT environment variable (if set). See policy CMP0074.
trans-unit.target: 调用 find_package(<PackageName>) 将搜索由 <PackageName>_ROOT 环境变量指定的前缀，其中 <PackageName> 是为 find_package() 调用提供的名称，而 _ROOT 是文字。例如， find_package(Foo) 将搜索 Foo_ROOT 环境变量（如果设置）中指定的前缀。请参阅策略 CMP0074 。

trans-unit.source: Check that the <flag> is accepted by the compiler without a diagnostic. Stores the result in an internal cache entry named <var>.

trans-unit.source: Check that the <symbol> is available after including given header <files> and store the result in a <variable>. Specify the list of files in one argument as a semicolon-separated list. <variable> will be created as an internal cache variable.
trans-unit.target: 在包含给定的头 <files> 之后，检查 <symbol> 是否可用，并将结果存储在 <variable> 中。将一个参数中的文件列表指定为以分号分隔的列表。 <variable> 将被创建为内部缓存变量。

trans-unit.source: Check that the <symbol> is available after including given header <files> and store the result in a <variable>. Specify the list of files in one argument as a semicolon-separated list. CHECK_CXX_SYMBOL_EXISTS() can be used to check in C++ files, as opposed to CHECK_SYMBOL_EXISTS(), which works only for C.
trans-unit.target: 在包含给定的头 <files> 之后，检查 <symbol> 是否可用，并将结果存储在 <variable> 中。将一个参数中的文件列表指定为以分号分隔的列表。 CHECK_CXX_SYMBOL_EXISTS() 可以使用在C ++中的文件进行检查，而不是 CHECK_SYMBOL_EXISTS() ，这仅适用于工作 C 。

trans-unit.source: Check that the <symbol> is available after including given header <files> and store the result in a <variable>. Specify the list of files in one argument as a semicolon-separated list. check_cxx_symbol_exists() can be used to check for symbols as seen by the C++ compiler, as opposed to check_symbol_exists(), which always uses the C compiler.
trans-unit.target: 在包含给定的头 <files> 之后，检查 <symbol> 是否可用，并将结果存储在 <variable> 中。将一个参数中的文件列表指定为以分号分隔的列表。 check_cxx_symbol_exists() 可用于检查C ++编译器看到的符号，而 check_symbol_exists() 始终使用 C 编译器。

trans-unit.source: Check that the link <flag> is accepted by the <lang> compiler without a diagnostic. Stores the result in an internal cache entry named <var>.
trans-unit.target: 检查链接 <flag> 是否被 <lang> 编译器接受而没有诊断。将结果存储在名为 <var> 的内部缓存条目中。

trans-unit.source: Check that the source supplied in <code> can be compiled as a C source file and linked as an executable (so it must contain at least a main() function). The result will be stored in the internal cache variable specified by <resultVar>, with a boolean true value for success and boolean false for failure. If FAIL_REGEX is provided, then failure is determined by checking if anything in the output matches any of the specified regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 检查 <code> 中提供的源是否可以编译为C源文件并链接为可执行文件（因此它必须至少包含 main() 函数）。结果将存储在 <resultVar> 指定的内部缓存变量中，其中布尔值true表示成功，布尔值false表示失败。如果提供了 FAIL_REGEX ，则通过检查输出中是否有任何匹配的指定正则表达式来确定失败。

trans-unit.source: Check that the source supplied in <code> can be compiled as a C source file, linked as an executable and then run. The <code> must contain at least a main() function. If the <code> could be built and run successfully, the internal cache variable specified by <resultVar> will be set to 1, otherwise it will be set to an value that evaluates to boolean false (e.g. an empty string or an error message).
trans-unit.target: 检查 <code> 中提供的源是否可以编译为C源文件，链接为可执行文件然后运行。所述 <code> 必须包含至少一个 main() 函数。如果 <code> 可以成功构建并运行，则 <resultVar> 指定的内部缓存变量将被设置为1，否则将被设置为一个值，该值的计算结果为布尔值false（例如，空字符串或错误消息） 。

trans-unit.source: Check that the source supplied in <code> can be compiled as a C++ source file and linked as an executable (so it must contain at least a main() function). The result will be stored in the internal cache variable specified by <resultVar>, with a boolean true value for success and boolean false for failure. If FAIL_REGEX is provided, then failure is determined by checking if anything in the output matches any of the specified regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 检查 <code> 中提供的源是否可以编译为C ++源文件并可以作为可执行文件链接（因此它必须至少包含 main() 函数）。结果将存储在 <resultVar> 指定的内部缓存变量中，其中布尔值true表示成功，布尔值false表示失败。如果提供了 FAIL_REGEX ，则通过检查输出中是否有任何匹配的指定正则表达式来确定失败。

trans-unit.source: Check that the source supplied in <code> can be compiled as a C++ source file, linked as an executable and then run. The <code> must contain at least a main() function. If the <code> could be built and run successfully, the internal cache variable specified by <resultVar> will be set to 1, otherwise it will be set to an value that evaluates to boolean false (e.g. an empty string or an error message).
trans-unit.target: 检查 <code> 中提供的源是否可以编译为C ++源文件，链接为可执行文件然后运行。所述 <code> 必须包含至少一个 main() 函数。如果 <code> 可以成功构建并运行，则 <resultVar> 指定的内部缓存变量将被设置为1，否则将被设置为一个值，该值的计算结果为布尔值false（例如，空字符串或错误消息） 。

trans-unit.source: Check that the source supplied in <code> can be compiled as a Objectie-C source file and linked as an executable (so it must contain at least a main() function). The result will be stored in the internal cache variable specified by <resultVar>, with a boolean true value for success and boolean false for failure. If FAIL_REGEX is provided, then failure is determined by checking if anything in the output matches any of the specified regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 检查 <code> 中提供的源是否可以编译为Objectie-C源文件并链接为可执行文件（因此它必须至少包含 main() 函数）。结果将存储在 <resultVar> 指定的内部缓存变量中，其中布尔值true表示成功，布尔值false表示失败。如果提供了 FAIL_REGEX ，则通过检查输出中是否有任何匹配的指定正则表达式来确定失败。

trans-unit.source: CodeBlocks uses its own compiler id string which differs from CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID. If this variable is left empty, CMake tries to recognize the CodeBlocks compiler id automatically. Otherwise the specified string is used in the CodeBlocks project file. See the CodeBlocks documentation for valid compiler id strings.
trans-unit.target: CodeBlocks使用其自己的编译器ID字符串，该字符串不同于 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_ID 。如果将此变量保留为空，则CMake会尝试自动识别CodeBlocks编译器ID。否则，在CodeBlocks项目文件中使用指定的字符串。有关有效的编译器ID字符串，请参见CodeBlocks文档。

trans-unit.source: Commands
trans-unit.target: Commands

trans-unit.source: Commands cmake_minimum_required(VERSION) and cmake_policy(VERSION) by default leave policies introduced after the given version unset. Set CMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN> to OLD or NEW to specify the default for policy CMP<NNNN>, where <NNNN> is the policy number.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，命令 cmake_minimum_required(VERSION) 和 cmake_policy(VERSION) 会在未设置给定版本后保留引入的策略。将 CMAKE_POLICY_DEFAULT_CMP<NNNN> 设置为 OLD 或 NEW ,以指定策略 CMP<NNNN> 的默认值，其中 <NNNN> 是策略号。

trans-unit.source: Commands are executed concurrently as a pipeline, with the standard output of each process piped to the standard input of the next. A single standard error pipe is used for all processes.
trans-unit.target: 命令以流水线的形式并发执行,每个进程的标准输出都以流水线的形式传送到下一个进程的标准输入。所有进程都使用一个标准错误管道。

trans-unit.source: Commands created by the function() and macro() commands record policy settings when they are created and use the pre-record policies when they are invoked. If the function or macro implementation sets policies, the changes automatically propagate up through callers until they reach the closest nested policy stack entry.
trans-unit.target: 由 function() 和 macro() 命令创建的命令在创建策略时记录策略设置，并在调用它们时使用预记录策略。如果函数或宏实现设置了策略，则更改将自动通过调用程序向上传播，直到它们到达最接近的嵌套策略堆栈条目为止。

trans-unit.source: Commands such as add_custom_command(), which generates rules to be run at build time can transparently use an EXECUTABLE target as a COMMAND executable. The buildsystem rules will ensure that the executable is built before attempting to run the command.
trans-unit.target: 诸如 add_custom_command() 之类的命令会生成要在构建时运行的规则，这些命令可以透明地将 EXECUTABLE 目标用作 COMMAND 可执行文件。生成系统规则将确保在尝试运行命令之前已生成可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Compound conditions are evaluated in the following order of precedence: Innermost parentheses are evaluated first. Next come unary tests such as EXISTS, COMMAND, and DEFINED. Then binary tests such as EQUAL, LESS, LESS_EQUAL, GREATER, GREATER_EQUAL, STREQUAL, STRLESS, STRLESS_EQUAL, STRGREATER, STRGREATER_EQUAL, VERSION_EQUAL, VERSION_LESS, VERSION_LESS_EQUAL, VERSION_GREATER, VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL, and MATCHES. Then the boolean operators in the order NOT, AND, and finally OR.
trans-unit.target: 按照以下优先顺序评估复合条件：首先评估最里面的括号。接下来是一元测试，例如 EXISTS ， COMMAND 和 DEFINED 。然后二进制测试，如 EQUAL ， LESS ， LESS_EQUAL ， GREATER ， GREATER_EQUAL ， STREQUAL ， STRLESS ， STRLESS_EQUAL ， STRGREATER ， STRGREATER_EQUAL ， VERSION_EQUAL ， VERSION_LESS ， VERSION_LESS_EQUAL ， VERSION_GREATER ， VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL 和 MATCHES 。然后，布尔运算符的顺序为 NOT ， AND ，最后是 OR 。

trans-unit.source: Config mode search attempts to locate a configuration file provided by the package to be found. A cache entry called <PackageName>_DIR is created to hold the directory containing the file. By default the command searches for a package with the name <PackageName>. If the NAMES option is given the names following it are used instead of <PackageName>. The command searches for a file called <PackageName>Config.cmake or <lower-case-package-name>-config.cmake for each name specified. A replacement set of possible configuration file names may be given using the CONFIGS option. The search procedure is specified below. Once found, the configuration file is read and processed by CMake. Since the file is provided by the package it already knows the location of package contents. The full path to the configuration file is stored in the cmake variable <PackageName>_CONFIG.
trans-unit.target: 配置模式搜索尝试查找要查找的软件包提供的配置文件。创建一个名为 <PackageName>_DIR 的缓存条目，以保存包含该文件的目录。默认情况下，该命令搜索名称为 <PackageName> 的软件包。如果给定 NAMES 选项，则使用其后的名称代替 <PackageName> 。该命令为指定的每个名称搜索名为 <PackageName>Config.cmake 或 <lower-case-package-name>-config.cmake 的文件。可以使用 CONFIGS 给出一组可能的配置文件名称的替换集选项。搜索步骤在下面指定。找到后，CMake将读取并处理配置文件。由于文件是由包提供的，因此它已经知道包内容的位置。配置文件的完整路径存储在cmake变量 <PackageName>_CONFIG 中。

trans-unit.source: Consider using the target-wide Fortran_PREPROCESS property if all source files in a target need to be preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要对目标中的所有源文件进行预处理，请考虑使用目标范围的 Fortran_PREPROCESS 属性。

trans-unit.source: Consistency in this sense has the meaning that if the property is set, then it must have the same boolean value as all others, and if the property is not set, then it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 这种意义上的一致性具有这样的含义:如果该属性被设置,那么它必须与其他所有属性具有相同的布尔值,如果该属性没有被设置,那么它被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Constant expressions, as defined in N2235.
trans-unit.target: 常量表达式，如N2235中所定义。

trans-unit.source: Consuming code then simply links to the foo target as usual and uses the feature-appropriate include directory
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用代码像往常一样简单地链接到 foo 目标，并使用功能适当的include目录

trans-unit.source: Contains the full path to the xsltproc executable if found.
trans-unit.target: 包含xsltproc可执行文件的完整路径(如果找到的话)。

trans-unit.source: Content of ... converted to a C identifier. The conversion follows the same behavior as string(MAKE_C_IDENTIFIER).
trans-unit.target: ... 的内容转换为C标识符。转换遵循与 string(MAKE_C_IDENTIFIER) 相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: Content of ... converted to shell path style. For example, slashes are converted to backslashes in Windows shells and drive letters are converted to posix paths in MSYS shells. The ... must be an absolute path. The ... may be a semicolon-separated list of paths, in which case each path is converted individually and a result list is generated using the shell path separator (: on POSIX and ; on Windows). Be sure to enclose the argument containing this genex in double quotes in CMake source code so that ; does not split arguments.
trans-unit.target: ... 的内容转换为外壳路径样式。例如，在Windows Shell中将斜杠转换为反斜杠，在MSYS Shell中将驱动器号转换为posix路径。该 ... 必须是绝对路径。所述 ... 可以是分号分隔的列表的路径在这种情况下，每个路径都单独转化并使用壳路径分离器生成的结果列表（ : 上POSIX和 ; 在Windows上）。确保在CMake源代码中用双引号括起包含该基因的参数，以便 ; 不拆分参数。

trans-unit.source: Content of ... except when evaluated in a link interface while propagating Transitive Usage Requirements, in which case it is the empty string. Intended for use only in an INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES target property, perhaps via the target_link_libraries() command, to specify private link dependencies without other usage requirements.
trans-unit.target: ... 的内容，除非在传播“ 传递用法要求”时在链接界面中进行评估，否则为空字符串。旨在仅在 INTERFACE_LINK_LIBRARIES 目标属性中使用，可能通过 target_link_libraries() 命令使用，以指定专用链接依赖性，而没有其他使用要求。

trans-unit.source: Content of ... when the property is exported using export(), or when the target is used by another target in the same buildsystem. Expands to the empty string otherwise.
trans-unit.target: ... 的内容，当使用 export() 导出属性时，或同一构建系统中的另一个目标使用该目标时。否则扩展为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Content of ... when the property is exported using install(EXPORT), and empty otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 使用 install(EXPORT) 导出属性时 ... 的内容，否则为空。

trans-unit.source: Content of expr evaluated as a generator expression in the context of tgt target. This enables consumption of custom target properties that themselves contain generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: 在 tgt target 的上下文中， expr 的内容被评估为生成器表达式。这样可以使用自定义目标属性，这些目标属性本身包含生成器表达式。

trans-unit.source: Content of expr evaluated as a generator expression in the current context. This enables consumption of generator expressions whose evaluation results itself in generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: 在当前上下文中， expr 的内容被评估为生成器表达式。这使得能够使用生成器表达式，其求值结果本身就是生成器表达式。

trans-unit.source: Content of string converted to lower case.
trans-unit.target: string 内容转换为小写。

trans-unit.source: Content of string converted to upper case.
trans-unit.target: string 内容转换为大写。

trans-unit.source: Content of the install prefix when the target is exported via install(EXPORT) and empty otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 通过 install(EXPORT) 导出目标时安装前缀的内容，否则为空。

trans-unit.source: Content of the install prefix when the target is exported via install(EXPORT), or when evaluated in INSTALL_NAME_DIR, and empty otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 当目标通过 install(EXPORT) 导出或在 INSTALL_NAME_DIR 中进行评估时，安装前缀的内容，否则为空。

trans-unit.source: Content population details would normally be defined separately from the command that performs the actual population. This separation ensures that all of the dependency details are defined before anything may try to use those details to populate content. This is particularly important in more complex project hierarchies where dependencies may be shared between multiple projects.
trans-unit.target: 内容填充细节通常会与执行实际填充的命令分开定义。这种分离可以确保在任何东西试图使用这些细节来填充内容之前,所有的依赖性细节都被定义。这在更复杂的项目层次结构中尤其重要,因为在这些层次结构中,依赖关系可能在多个项目之间共享。

trans-unit.source: Contents is assigned to components by the COMPONENT argument of CMake’s install() command. Components can be annotated with user-friendly names and descriptions, inter-component dependencies, etc., and grouped in various ways to customize the resulting installer, using the commands described below.
trans-unit.target: 通过CMake的 install() 命令的 COMPONENT 参数将内容分配给组件。可以使用用户友好的名称和描述，组件间的依存关系等对组件进行批注，并使用以下描述的命令以各种方式将其分组以定制生成的安装程序。

trans-unit.source: Contents of ADDITIONAL_CLEAN_FILES may use generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: ADDITIONAL_CLEAN_FILES 的内容可以使用 generator expressions 。

trans-unit.source: Contents of ANDROID_JAR_DIRECTORIES may use “generator expressions” with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions.

trans-unit.source: Contents of COMPILE_DEFINITIONS may use “generator expressions” with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions. See the cmake-buildsystem(7) manual for more on defining buildsystem properties.
trans-unit.target: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 的内容可以使用语法 $<...> “生成器表达式” 。有关可用的表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。有关定义构建系统属性的更多信息，请参见 cmake-buildsystem(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: Contents of COMPILE_DEFINITIONS may use cmake-generator-expressions(7) with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions. However, Xcode does not support per-config per-source settings, so expressions that depend on the build configuration are not allowed with that generator.
trans-unit.target: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 的内容可以使用语法 $<...> cmake-generator-expressions(7) 。有关可用的表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。但是， Xcode 不支持每个配置的每个源设置，因此该生成器不允许使用依赖于构建配置的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Create a universally unique identifier (aka GUID) as per RFC4122 based on the hash of the combined values of <namespace> (which itself has to be a valid UUID) and <name>. The hash algorithm can be either MD5 (Version 3 UUID) or SHA1 (Version 5 UUID). A UUID has the format xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx where each x represents a lower case hexadecimal character. Where required an uppercase representation can be requested with the optional UPPER flag.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <namespace> （其本身必须是有效的UUID）和 <name> 的组合值的哈希值，根据RFC4122创建一个通用唯一标识符（aka GUID）。哈希算法可以是 MD5 （版本3 UUID）或 SHA1 （版本5 UUID）。UUID的格式为 xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx ，其中每个 x 代表小写的十六进制字符。如果需要，可以使用可选的 UPPER 标志请求大写表示。

trans-unit.source: Created by Eric Wing. This module is a bit more complicated than the other FindSDL* family modules. The reason is that SDL_sound can be compiled in a large variety of different ways which are independent of platform. SDL_sound may dynamically link against other 3rd party libraries to get additional codec support, such as Ogg Vorbis, SMPEG, ModPlug, MikMod, FLAC, Speex, and potentially others. Under some circumstances which I don’t fully understand, there seems to be a requirement that dependent libraries of libraries you use must also be explicitly linked against in order to successfully compile. SDL_sound does not currently have any system in place to know how it was compiled. So this CMake module does the hard work in trying to discover which 3rd party libraries are required for building (if any). This module uses a brute force approach to create a test program that uses SDL_sound, and then tries to build it. If the build fails, it parses the error output for known symbol names to figure out which libraries are needed.
trans-unit.target: 由Eric Wing创建。该模块比其他FindSDL *系列模块要复杂一些。原因是SDL_sound可以以多种不同的方式进行编译，而这些方式与平台无关。 SDL_sound可以动态链接到其他第三方库以获得其他编解码器支持，例如Ogg Vorbis，SMPEG，ModPlug，MikMod，FLAC，Speex以及其他可能的支持。在某些我不完全了解的情况下，似乎需要对使用的库的依赖库也进行显式链接，以便成功进行编译。 SDL_sound当前没有任何系统可以知道如何编译。因此，此CMake模块在尝试发现构建哪个第三方库（如果有）方面做了艰苦的工作。该模块使用蛮力方法创建使用SDL_sound的测试程序，然后尝试构建它。如果构建失败，它将解析错误输出以获取已知符号名称，以找出需要哪些库。

trans-unit.source: Created by Eric Wing. This was influenced by the FindSDL.cmake module.
trans-unit.target: 由Eric Wing创建。这受 FindSDL.cmake 模块的影响。

trans-unit.source: Creates a binary package. This target is only automatically available if the CMake files provide CPack-based packages.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个二进制包.只有当 CMake 文件提供基于 CPack 的包时,这个目标才会自动可用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a file <filename> that may be included by outside projects to import targets from the current project’s build tree. This is useful during cross-compiling to build utility executables that can run on the host platform in one project and then import them into another project being compiled for the target platform. If the NAMESPACE option is given the <namespace> string will be prepended to all target names written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 创建文件 <filename> ，外部项目可能会包含该文件以从当前项目的构建树中导入目标。这在交叉编译过程中很有用，以构建可在一个项目中在宿主平台上运行的实用程序可执行文件，然后将其导入到针对目标平台进行编译的另一个项目中。如果给定了 NAMESPACE 选项，则 <namespace> 字符串将位于所有写入文件的目标名称之前。

trans-unit.source: Creates a source package. This target is only automatically available if the CMake files provide CPack-based packages.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个源码包.只有当 CMake 文件提供基于 CPack 的包时,这个目标才会自动可用。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Alias Target, such that <name> can be used to refer to <target> in subsequent commands. The <name> does not appear in the generated buildsystem as a make target. The <target> may not be a non-GLOBALImported Target or an ALIAS. ALIAS targets can be used as linkable targets and as targets to read properties from. They can also be tested for existence with the regular if(TARGET) subcommand. The <name> may not be used to modify properties of <target>, that is, it may not be used as the operand of set_property(), set_target_properties(), target_link_libraries() etc. An ALIAS target may not be installed or exported.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个Alias Target，这样 <name> 可用于在后续命令中引用 <target> 。所述 <name> 不会出现在所生成的构建系统作为make目标。所述 <target> 可以不是非 GLOBAL 进口目标或 ALIAS 。 ALIAS 目标可用作链接目标以及从中读取属性的目标。也可以使用常规 if(TARGET) 子命令测试它们的存在。所述 <name> 可以不被用于修改的属性 <target> ，即，它可以不被用作操作数 set_property() ， set_target_properties() ， target_link_libraries() 等的 ALIAS 目标可能没有安装或导出。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Alias Target, such that <name> can be used to refer to <target> in subsequent commands. The <name> does not appear in the generated buildsystem as a make target. The <target> may not be a non-GLOBALImported Target or an ALIAS. ALIAS targets can be used as targets to read properties from, executables for custom commands and custom targets. They can also be tested for existence with the regular if(TARGET) subcommand. The <name> may not be used to modify properties of <target>, that is, it may not be used as the operand of set_property(), set_target_properties(), target_link_libraries() etc. An ALIAS target may not be installed or exported.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个Alias Target，这样 <name> 可用于在后续命令中引用 <target> 。所述 <name> 不会出现在所生成的构建系统作为make目标。所述 <target> 可以不是非 GLOBAL 进口目标或 ALIAS 。 ALIAS 目标可用作目标，以从中读取自定义命令和自定义目标的可执行文件的属性。也可以使用常规 if(TARGET) 子命令测试它们的存在。所述 <name> 可以不被用于修改的属性 <target> ，即，它可以不被用作操作数 set_property() ， set_target_properties() ， target_link_libraries() 等的 ALIAS 目标可能没有安装或导出。

trans-unit.source: Creates an Alias Target, such that <name> can be used to refer to <target> in subsequent commands. The <name> does not appear in the generated buildsystem as a make target. The <target> may not be an ALIAS.

trans-unit.source: Creates an IMPORTED library target called <name>. No rules are generated to build it, and the IMPORTED target property is True. The target name has scope in the directory in which it is created and below, but the GLOBAL option extends visibility. It may be referenced like any target built within the project. IMPORTED libraries are useful for convenient reference from commands like target_link_libraries(). Details about the imported library are specified by setting properties whose names begin in IMPORTED_ and INTERFACE_.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个名为 <name> 的导入库目标。不会生成任何规则来构建它，并且 IMPORTED 目标属性为 True 。目标名称在创建它的目录及其下的目录中具有作用域，但是 GLOBAL 选项扩展了可见性。可以像在项目中构建的任何目标一样引用它。 IMPORTED 库对于方便从诸如 target_link_libraries() 之类的命令进行引用非常有用。通过设置名称以 IMPORTED_ 和 INTERFACE_ 开头的属性来指定有关导入库的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Creating a target for a step allows it to be used as a dependency of another target or to be triggered manually. Having targets for specific steps also allows them to be driven independently of each other by specifying targets on build command lines. For example, you may be submitting to a sub-project based dashboard where you want to drive the configure portion of the build, then submit to the dashboard, followed by the build portion, followed by tests. If you invoke a custom target that depends on a step halfway through the step dependency chain, then all the previous steps will also run to ensure everything is up to date.
trans-unit.target: 为一个步骤创建一个目标,可以让它作为另一个目标的依赖,或者手动触发。为特定步骤设置目标,还可以通过在构建命令行中指定目标,使它们相互独立地驱动。例如,你可能会提交到一个基于子项目的仪表板,你想驱动构建的配置部分,然后提交到仪表板,接着是构建部分,然后是测试。如果你在步骤依赖链的中途调用了一个依赖于步骤的自定义目标,那么之前的所有步骤也会运行,以确保一切是最新的。

trans-unit.source: Cross compiling for compute nodes in the Cray Linux Environment can be done without needing a separate toolchain file. Specifying -DCMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME=CrayLinuxEnvironment on the CMake command line will ensure that the appropriate build settings and search paths are configured. The platform will pull its configuration from the current environment variables and will configure a project to use the compiler wrappers from the Cray Programming Environment’s PrgEnv-* modules if present and loaded.
trans-unit.target: 可以在Cray Linux环境中对计算节点进行交叉编译，而无需单独的工具链文件。在CMake命令行上指定 -DCMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME=CrayLinuxEnvironment 将确保配置了适当的构建设置和搜索路径。该平台将从当前环境变量中提取其配置，并将配置一个项目以使用Cray编程环境的 PrgEnv-* 模块（如果存在并已加载）中的编译器包装。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling C files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CC default compilation flags, after which the value for CFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_C_FLAGS. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_C_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 C 文件时使用的默认编译标志。CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 CC 默认编译标志，此后 CFLAGS 的值将以 CMAKE_C_FLAGS 的形式存储在缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_C_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling CSharp files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CSharp default compilation flags, after which the value for CSFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 CSharp 文件时使用的默认编译标志。将只使用CMake的第一配置，以确定 CSharp 默认编译标志，在这之后的值 CSFLAGS 存储在缓存中 CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_CSharp_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling CUDA files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CUDA default compilation flags, after which the value for CUDAFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 CUDA 文件时要使用的默认编译标志。将只使用CMake的第一配置，以确定 CUDA 默认编译标志，在这之后的值 CUDAFLAGS 存储在缓存中 CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_CUDA_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling CXX (C++) files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine CXX default compilation flags, after which the value for CXXFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS. For any configuration run ( including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 CXX （C ++）文件时要使用的默认编译标志。 CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 CXX 默认编译标志，此后 CXXFLAGS 的值将以 CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS 的形式存储在缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling Fortran files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine Fortran default compilation flags, after which the value for FFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 Fortran 文件时要使用的默认编译标志。将只使用CMake的第一配置，以确定 Fortran 的默认编译标志，在这之后的值 FFLAGS 存储在缓存中 CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_Fortran_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling ISPC files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine ISPC default compilation flags, after which the value for ISPCFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_ISPC_FLAGS. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_ISPC_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 ISPC 文件时使用的默认编译标志。将只使用CMake的第一配置，以确定 ISPC 默认编译标志，在这之后的值 ISPCFLAGS 存储在缓存中 CMAKE_ISPC_FLAGS 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_ISPC_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling resource files. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine resource default compilation flags, after which the value for RCFLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_RC_FLAGS. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_RC_FLAGS variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译 resource 文件时使用的默认编译标志。将只使用CMake的第一配置，以确定 resource 默认编译标志，在这之后的值 RCFLAGS 存储在缓存中 CMAKE_RC_FLAGS 。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_RC_FLAGS 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compilation flags to be used when compiling a specific dialect of an assembly language. ASM<DIALECT>FLAGS can be ASMFLAGS, ASM_NASMFLAGS, ASM_MASMFLAGS or ASM-ATTFLAGS. Will only be used by CMake on the first configuration to determine ASM_<DIALECT> default compilation flags, after which the value for ASM<DIALECT>FLAGS is stored in the cache as CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_FLAGS <CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS>. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored, if the CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_FLAGS <CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS> variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 编译汇编语言的特定方言时要使用的默认编译标志。 ASM<DIALECT>FLAGS 可以是 ASMFLAGS ， ASM_NASMFLAGS ， ASM_MASMFLAGS 或 ASM-ATTFLAGS 。 CMake将仅在第一种配置上使用它来确定 ASM_<DIALECT> 默认编译标志，此后， ASM<DIALECT>FLAGS 的值 CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_FLAGS <CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS> 形式存储在缓存中。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_ASM<DIALECT>_FLAGS <CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS> 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Default compiler launcher to use for the specified language. Will only be used by CMake to initialize the variable on the first configuration. Afterwards, it is available through the cache setting of the variable of the same name. For any configuration run (including the first), the environment variable will be ignored if the CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_LAUNCHER variable is defined.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定语言的默认编译器启动器。CMake仅将其用于在第一个配置上初始化变量。之后，可以通过同名变量的缓存设置来使用它。对于任何配置运行（包括第一个配置），如果定义了 CMAKE_<LANG>_COMPILER_LAUNCHER 变量，则将忽略环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated. This is allowed only if policy CMP0114 is not set to NEW. Generates custom targets for the specified steps and prevent these targets from having the usual dependencies applied to them. If this option is not specified, the default value is taken from the EP_INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS directory property. This option is mostly useful for allowing individual steps to be driven independently, such as for a CDash setup where each step should be initiated and reported individually rather than as one whole build. See ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() below for further discussion of the effects of this option.
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用。仅当策略 CMP0114 未设置为 NEW 时,才允许这样做。为指定的步骤生成自定义目标，并防止这些目标具有通常的依赖项。如果未指定此选项，则默认值来自 EP_INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS 目录属性。此选项对于允许独立驱动单个步骤非常有用，例如用于CDash设置，其中每个步骤应单独启动和报告，而不是作为一个整体构建。有关此选项的效果的进一步讨论，请参见下面的 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 。

trans-unit.source: Disclaimer: Most native build tools have poor support for escaping certain values. CMake has work-arounds for many cases but some values may just not be possible to pass correctly. If a value does not seem to be escaped correctly, do not attempt to work-around the problem by adding escape sequences to the value. Your work-around may break in a future version of CMake that has improved escape support. Instead consider defining the macro in a (configured) header file. Then report the limitation. Known limitations include:
trans-unit.target: 声明:大多数本地构建工具对某些值的转义支持较差。CMake对许多情况都有解决方法,但有些值可能无法正确传递。如果一个值似乎没有被正确转义,不要试图通过添加转义序列来解决这个问题。你的变通方法可能会在未来的CMake版本中被破坏,因为该版本已经改进了转义支持。可以考虑在(配置的)头文件中定义宏。然后报告这个限制.已知的限制包括:

trans-unit.source: Do not delete the files and directories created for try_compile() calls. This is useful in debugging failed try_compiles. It may however change the results of the try-compiles as old junk from a previous try-compile may cause a different test to either pass or fail incorrectly. This option is best used for one try-compile at a time, and only when debugging.
trans-unit.target: 不要删除为 try_compile() 调用创建的文件和目录。这在调试try_compiles失败时很有用。但是，它可能会更改尝试编译的结果，因为来自先前尝试编译的旧垃圾可能导致不同的测试通过或错误地失败。此选项最好一次仅在调试时用于一次尝试编译。

Failure to follow this rule is not diagnosed and leaves the location of the target undefined.

trans-unit.source: Do not set the value, even if the generator supports it. This is useful if, for example, a preset uses the Ninja generator, and an IDE knows how to set up the Visual C++ environment from the architecture and toolset fields. In that case, CMake will ignore the field, but the IDE can use them to set up the environment before invoking CMake.

trans-unit.source: Each PUSH must have a matching POP to erase any changes. This is useful to make temporary changes to policy settings. Calls to the cmake_minimum_required(VERSION), cmake_policy(VERSION), or cmake_policy(SET) commands influence only the current top of the policy stack.
trans-unit.target: 每个 PUSH 必须具有匹配的 POP 才能擦除所有更改。这对于临时更改策略设置很有用。调用 cmake_minimum_required(VERSION) ， cmake_policy(VERSION) 或 cmake_policy(SET) 命令仅影响策略堆栈的当前顶部。

trans-unit.source: Each CPack Generator (RPM, DEB, ARCHIVE, NSIS, DMG, etc…) has a legacy default behavior. e.g. RPM builds monolithic whereas NSIS builds component. One can change the default behavior by setting this variable to 0/1 or OFF/ON.
trans-unit.target: 每个CPack生成器（RPM，DEB，ARCHIVE，NSIS，DMG等）都具有旧式默认行为。例如，RPM构建整体，而NSIS构建组件。可以通过将此变量设置为0/1或OFF / ON来更改默认行为。

trans-unit.source: Each CPack generator has a built-in default value for this variable. E.g. Archive generators (ZIP, TGZ, …) includes the top level whereas RPM or DEB don’t. The user may override the default value by setting this variable.
trans-unit.target: 每个CPack生成器都有此变量的内置默认值。例如，归档生成器（ZIP，TGZ等）包括顶层，而RPM或DEB不包括顶层。用户可以通过设置此变量来覆盖默认值。

trans-unit.source: Each CPack generator has a default value (like /usr). This default value may be overwritten from the CMakeLists.txt or the cpack(1) command line by setting an alternative value. Example:
trans-unit.target: 每个CPack生成器都有一个默认值（如 /usr ）。通过设置替代值，可以从 CMakeLists.txt 或 cpack(1) 命令行覆盖此默认值。例：

trans-unit.source: Each array element is a JSON object with members whose names are equal to the desired resource types, such as gpus. These names must start with a lowercase letter or an underscore, and subsequent characters can be a lowercase letter, a digit, or an underscore. Uppercase letters are not allowed, because certain platforms have case-insensitive environment variables. See the Environment Variables section below for more information. It is recommended that the resource type name be the plural of a noun, such as gpus or crypto_chips (and not gpu or crypto_chip.)
trans-unit.target: 每个数组元素都是一个JSON对象，其成员的名称等于所需的资源类型，例如 gpus 。这些名称必须以小写字母或下划线开头，后续字符可以是小写字母，数字或下划线。不允许使用大写字母，因为某些平台具有不区分大小写的环境变量。有关更多信息，请参见下面的环境变量部分。建议资源类型名称是名词的复数形式，例如 gpus 或 crypto_chips （而不是 gpu 或 crypto_chip )。

trans-unit.source: Each calculated “compatible” property value may be read in the consumer at generate-time using generator expressions.
trans-unit.target: 可以在生成时使用生成器表达式在使用者中读取每个计算出的“兼容”属性值。

trans-unit.source: Each component is an unsigned integer and the suffix may be an arbitrary string.
trans-unit.target: 每个组件都是一个无符号整数,后缀可以是一个任意的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Each component is separate and you must opt in to each module. You must also opt into OpenGL (and OpenThreads?) as these modules won’t do it for you. This is to allow you control over your own system piece by piece in case you need to opt out of certain components or change the Find behavior for a particular module (perhaps because the default FindOpenGL.cmake module doesn’t work with your system as an example). If you want to use a more convenient module that includes everything, use the FindOpenSceneGraph.cmake instead of the Findosg*.cmake modules.
trans-unit.target: 每个组件都是独立的，您必须选择加入每个模块。您还必须选择使用OpenGL（和OpenThreads？），因为这些模块无法为您完成。这是为了使您可以逐个控制自己的系统，以防万一您需要退出某些组件或更改特定模块的“查找”行为（可能是因为默认的FindOpenGL.cmake模块不适用于您的系统）。例）。如果要使用包含所有内容的更方便的模块，请使用FindOpenSceneGraph.cmake而不是Findosg * .cmake模块。

trans-unit.target: 每个条目都是一个包含成员的JSON对象。

trans-unit.source: Each executable and library described in the CMake files is a build target, and the buildsystem may describe custom targets, either for internal use, or for user consumption, for example to create documentation.
trans-unit.target: CMake文件中描述的每个可执行文件和库都是一个构建目标,构建系统可以描述自定义的目标,可以是内部使用,也可以是用户使用,例如创建文档。

trans-unit.target: 每个fileGroup对象可以包含以下键。

trans-unit.source: Each library name given to the NAMES option is first considered as a library file name and then considered with platform-specific prefixes (e.g. lib) and suffixes (e.g. .so). Therefore one may specify library file names such as libfoo.a directly. This can be used to locate static libraries on UNIX-like systems.
trans-unit.target: 赋予 NAMES 选项的每个库名都首先被视为库文件名，然后再考虑平台特定的前缀（例如 lib ）和后缀（例如 .so ）。因此，可以直接指定库文件名，例如 libfoo.a 。这可用于在类似UNIX的系统上定位静态库。

trans-unit.source: Each of the Directories in a source tree has its own variable bindings. Before processing the CMakeLists.txt file for a directory, CMake copies all variable bindings currently defined in the parent directory, if any, to initialize the new directory scope. CMake Scripts, when processed with cmake -P, bind variables in one “directory” scope.
trans-unit.target: 源树中的每个目录都有其自己的变量绑定。在处理目录的 CMakeLists.txt 文件之前，CMake复制当前在父目录中定义的所有变量绑定（如果有）以初始化新目录范围。使用 cmake -P 处理时，CMake 脚本会将变量绑定在一个“目录”范围内。

trans-unit.source: Each of the commands has a PRIVATE, PUBLIC and INTERFACE mode. The PRIVATE mode populates only the non-INTERFACE_ variant of the target property and the INTERFACE mode populates only the INTERFACE_ variants. The PUBLIC mode populates both variants of the respective target property. Each command may be invoked with multiple uses of each keyword:
trans-unit.target: 每个命令都有一个 PRIVATE ， PUBLIC 和 INTERFACE 模式。所述 PRIVATE 模式只填充所述非 INTERFACE_ 目标属性的变体和 INTERFACE 模式只填充所述 INTERFACE_ 变体。所述 PUBLIC 模式填充相应的目标属性的两个变体。每个命令可以通过每个关键字的多次使用来调用：

trans-unit.source: Each of the following LOG_... options can be used to wrap the relevant step in a script to capture its output to files. The log files will be created in LOG_DIR if supplied or otherwise the STAMP_DIR directory with step-specific file names.
trans-unit.target: 以下每个 LOG_... 选项可用于将相关步骤包装在脚本中，以将其输出捕获到文件中。如果提供了日志文件，将在 LOG_DIR 中创建日志文件，否则将在 STAMP_DIR 目录中创建具有特定于步骤的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Eclipse projects specify language plugins by using natures. This property should be set to the unique identifier for a nature (which looks like a Java package name).
trans-unit.target: Eclipse 项目通过使用 natures 指定语言插件。此属性应设置为自然界的唯一标识符(看起来像 Java 包名)。

trans-unit.source: Either a TYPE or a DESTINATION must be provided, but not both. A TYPE argument specifies the generic file type of the files being installed. A destination will then be set automatically by taking the corresponding variable from GNUInstallDirs, or by using a built-in default if that variable is not defined. See the table below for the supported file types and their corresponding variables and built-in defaults. Projects can provide a DESTINATION argument instead of a file type if they wish to explicitly define the install destination.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 TYPE 或 DESTINATION 必须提供，但不能同时使用。一个 TYPE 参数指定要安装的文件的通用文件类型。然后将通过从 GNUInstallDirs 中获取相应的变量来自动设置目标，或者如果未定义该变量，则使用内置的默认值。有关支持的文件类型及其对应的变量和内置默认值，请参见下表。如果项目希望显式定义安装目标，则可以提供 DESTINATION 参数而不是文件类型。

trans-unit.source: Either a TYPE or a DESTINATION must be provided, but not both. A TYPE argument specifies the generic file type of the files within the listed directories being installed. A destination will then be set automatically by taking the corresponding variable from GNUInstallDirs, or by using a built-in default if that variable is not defined. See the table below for the supported file types and their corresponding variables and built-in defaults. Projects can provide a DESTINATION argument instead of a file type if they wish to explicitly define the install destination.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 TYPE 或 DESTINATION 必须提供，但不能同时使用。一个 TYPE 参数指定要安装的列出的目录中的文件的通用文件类型。然后将通过从 GNUInstallDirs 中获取相应的变量来自动设置目标，或者如果未定义该变量，则使用内置的默认值。有关支持的文件类型及其对应的变量和内置默认值，请参见下表。如果项目希望显式定义安装目标，则可以提供 DESTINATION 参数而不是文件类型。

trans-unit.source: Else, an error diagnostic will be issued that neither the NDK or Standalone Toolchain can be found.
trans-unit.target: 否则,将发出一个错误诊断,即无法找到NDK或独立工具链。

trans-unit.source: Else, if a cmake variable ANDROID_NDK is set it will be used as the value of CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK, and the NDK will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果设置了cmake变量 ANDROID_NDK ，它将用作 CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK 的值，并且将使用NDK。

trans-unit.source: Else, if a cmake variable ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN is set, it will be used as the value of CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN, and the Standalone Toolchain will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果设置了cmake变量 ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN ，它将用作 CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN 的值，并且将使用独立工具链。

trans-unit.source: Else, if an environment variable ANDROID_NDK_ROOT or ANDROID_NDK is set, it will be used as the value of CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK, and the NDK will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果设置了环境变量 ANDROID_NDK_ROOT 或 ANDROID_NDK ，它将用作 CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK 的值，并且将使用NDK。

trans-unit.source: Else, if an environment variable ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN is set then it will be used as the value of CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN, and the Standalone Toolchain will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果设置了环境变量 ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN ，则它将用作 CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN 的值，并且将使用独立工具链。

trans-unit.source: Else, if the CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN variable is set, the Standalone Toolchain at the specified location will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果设置了 CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN 变量，将使用指定位置的独立工具链。

trans-unit.source: Else, if the CMAKE_SYSROOT variable is set to a directory of the form <ndk>/platforms/android-<api>/arch-<arch>, the <ndk> part will be used as the value of CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK and the NDK will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果将 CMAKE_SYSROOT 变量设置为 <ndk>/platforms/android-<api>/arch-<arch> 形式的目录，则 <ndk> 部分将用作 CMAKE_ANDROID_NDK 的值，NDK将为用过的。

trans-unit.source: Else, if the CMAKE_SYSROOT variable is set to a directory of the form <standalone-toolchain>/sysroot, the <standalone-toolchain> part will be used as the value of CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN and the Standalone Toolchain will be used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，如果将 CMAKE_SYSROOT 变量设置为 <standalone-toolchain>/sysroot sysroot形式的目录，则 <standalone-toolchain> 部分将用作 CMAKE_ANDROID_STANDALONE_TOOLCHAIN 的值，并且将使用Standalone Toolchain。

trans-unit.target: 如果指定了版本范围,则启用版本范围的处理。如果没有这个选项,如果指定了一个版本范围,会显示一个开发者警告。

trans-unit.source: Enable handling of package components. In this case, the command will report which components have been found and which are missing, and the <PackageName>_FOUND variable will be set to FALSE if any of the required components (i.e. not the ones listed after the OPTIONAL_COMPONENTS option of find_package()) are missing.
trans-unit.target: 启用包装组件的处理。在这种情况下，该命令将报告已找到哪些组件以及缺少哪些组件，并且如果有任何必需的组件（即不是 find_package() 的 OPTIONAL_COMPONENTS 选项之后列出的组件）， <PackageName>_FOUND 变量将设置为 FALSE 。） 缺失。

trans-unit.source: Enable handling of package components. In this case, the command will report which components have been found and which are missing, and the <PackageName>_FOUND variable will be set to FALSE if any of the required components (i.e. not the ones listed after the OPTIONAL_COMPONENTS option of find_package()) are missing.
trans-unit.target: 启用包装组件的处理。在这种情况下，该命令将报告已找到哪些组件以及缺少哪些组件，并且如果有任何必需的组件（即不是 find_package() 的 OPTIONAL_COMPONENTS 选项之后列出的组件）， <PackageName>_FOUND 变量将设置为 FALSE 。） 缺失。

trans-unit.target: 启用当前目录及以下目录的测试。

trans-unit.target: 启用 message() 命令，以输出附加到每条消息的上下文。

trans-unit.target: 启用以给定格式输出CMake脚本的剖析数据。

trans-unit.source: Enable this boolean property if a generated SHARED library should not have soname set. Default is to set soname on all shared libraries as long as the platform supports it. Generally, use this property only for leaf private libraries or plugins. If you use it on normal shared libraries which other targets link against, on some platforms a linker will insert a full path to the library (as specified at link time) into the dynamic section of the dependent binary. Therefore, once installed, dynamic loader may eventually fail to locate the library for the binary.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成的 SHARED 库不应设置 soname ,则启用此布尔属性。默认是在平台支持的所有共享库上设置 soname 。通常，仅将此属性用于叶私有库或插件。如果您在其他目标链接到的普通共享库上使用它，则在某些平台上，链接器会将库的完整路径（在链接时指定）插入到相关二进制文件的动态部分。因此，安装后，动态加载程序最终可能无法找到二进制文件的库。

trans-unit.source: Enable this boolean property to automatically create a module definition (.def) file with all global symbols found in the input .obj files for a SHARED library (or executable with ENABLE_EXPORTS) on Windows. The module definition file will be passed to the linker causing all symbols to be exported from the .dll. For global data symbols, __declspec(dllimport) must still be used when compiling against the code in the .dll. All other function symbols will be automatically exported and imported by callers. This simplifies porting projects to Windows by reducing the need for explicit dllexport markup, even in C++ classes.
trans-unit.target: 启用此布尔值属性可自动创建模块定义（ .def ）文件，该文件具有在Windows上 SHARED 库（或带有 ENABLE_EXPORTS 的可执行文件）的输入 .obj 文件中找到的所有全局符号。模块定义文件将传递到链接器，导致所有符号从 .dll 导出。对于全局数据符号，根据 .dll 中的代码进行编译时，仍必须使用 __declspec(dllimport) 。所有其他功能符号将由调用者自动导出和导入。通过减少对显式 dllexport 标记的需求，即使在 C++ 类。

trans-unit.target: 使用Makefile Generators时启用颜色输出。

trans-unit.source: Enables support for the named language in CMake. This is the same as the project() command but does not create any of the extra variables that are created by the project command. Example languages are CXX, C, CUDA, Fortran, and ASM.
trans-unit.target: 在CMake中启用对命名语言的支持。这与 project() 命令相同，但不会创建由project命令创建的任何其他变量。示例语言是 CXX ， C ， CUDA ， Fortran 和 ASM 。

trans-unit.source: Enables support for the named language in CMake. This is the same as the project() command but does not create any of the extra variables that are created by the project command. Example languages are CXX, C, CUDA, OBJC, OBJCXX, Fortran, ISPC, and ASM.
trans-unit.target: 在CMake中启用对命名语言的支持。这与 project() 命令相同，但不会创建由project命令创建的任何其他变量。示例语言是 CXX ， C ， CUDA ， OBJC ， OBJCXX ， Fortran ， ISPC 和 ASM 。

trans-unit.source: Enables testing for this directory and below.
trans-unit.target: 启用本目录及以下目录的测试。

trans-unit.source: Enables the export(PACKAGE) command when CMP0090 is set to NEW.
trans-unit.target: 当 CMP0090 设置为 NEW 时，启用 export(PACKAGE) 命令。

trans-unit.source: Enables the use of the Microsoft Foundation Classes (MFC). It should be set to 1 for the static MFC library, and 2 for the shared MFC library. This is used in Visual Studio project files.
trans-unit.target: 启用对Microsoft基础类（MFC）的使用。对于静态MFC库，应将其设置为 1 ，对于共享MFC库，应将其设置为 2 。在Visual Studio项目文件中使用。

trans-unit.source: Enables tracing output for target properties.
trans-unit.target: 启用目标属性的追踪输出。

trans-unit.source: Enables verbose debugging of the module
trans-unit.target: 启用模块的详细调试。

trans-unit.source: Enabling this option forces the build step to always be run. This can be the easiest way to robustly ensure that the external project’s own build dependencies are evaluated rather than relying on the default success timestamp-based method. This option is not normally needed unless developers are expected to modify something the external project’s build depends on in a way that is not detectable via the step target dependencies (e.g. SOURCE_DIR is used without a download method and developers might modify the sources in SOURCE_DIR).
trans-unit.target: 启用此选项将强制始终执行构建步骤。这是可靠地确保评估外部项目自己的构建依赖关系而不是依赖基于默认成功时间戳的方法的最简单方法。通常不需要此选项，除非期望开发人员以某种无法通过步骤目标依赖项检测到的方式来修改外部项目的构建所依赖的内容（例如，使用 SOURCE_DIR 而不使用下载方法，并且开发人员可以修改 SOURCE_DIR 中的源代码）。

trans-unit.target: Encoding

trans-unit.source: End a link line such that static system libraries are used.
trans-unit.target: 结束一个链接行,这样就可以使用静态系统库。

trans-unit.source: Ends a list of commands in a foreach block.
trans-unit.target: 结束foreach块中的命令列表。

trans-unit.target: 结束一个函数块中的命令列表。

trans-unit.target: 结束宏块中的命令列表。

trans-unit.target: 结束一个 while 块中的命令列表。

trans-unit.target: 在if块中结束一个命令列表。

trans-unit.source: Entries in the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS are prefixed with -D or /D and added to the compile line in an unspecified order. The DEFINE_SYMBOL target property is also added as a compile definition as a special convenience case for SHARED and MODULE library targets.
trans-unit.target: COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 中的条目以 -D 或 /D 为前缀，并以未指定的顺序添加到编译行中。该 DEFINE_SYMBOL target属性也被添加作为一个编译定义为一种特殊的便利情况下 SHARED 和 MODULE 库的目标。

trans-unit.source: Entries in the COMPILE_OPTIONS are escaped for the shell and added in the order of appearance in the property value. Several compile options have special separate handling, such as POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE.
trans-unit.target: 对于外壳， COMPILE_OPTIONS 中的条目进行转义，并按外观顺序将其添加到属性值中。几个编译选项具有特殊的单独处理，例如 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 。

trans-unit.source: Entries in the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES are added to the compile line with -I or -isystem prefixes and in the order of appearance in the property value.
trans-unit.target: INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中的条目将以 -I 或 -isystem 前缀并按属性值中出现的顺序添加到编译行中。

trans-unit.source: Environment variable $OPENALDIR can be used to set the prefix of OpenAL installation to be found.
trans-unit.target: 环境变量 $OPENALDIR 可用于设置要找到的OpenAL安装的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Environment variable $OPENALDIR.
trans-unit.target: 环境变量 $OPENALDIR 。

trans-unit.source: Environment variable that will exist and be set to 1 when a test executed by ctest(1) is run in interactive mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 ctest(1) 执行的测试以交互方式运行时，该环境变量将存在并设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: Environment variable that will exist when a test executed by ctest(1) is run in non-interactive mode. The value will be equal to CMAKE_VERSION.
trans-unit.target: 在非交互模式下运行 ctest(1) 执行的测试时将存在的环境变量。该值将等于 CMAKE_VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: Environment variable to specify the base directory of the MPI installation.
trans-unit.target: 环境变量,用于指定MPI安装的基本目录。

trans-unit.source: Environment variable with name <variable-name>. The variable name may not be an empty string. If the variable is defined in the environment field, that value is used instead of the value from the parent environment. If the environment variable is not defined, this evaluates as an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 名称为 <variable-name> 的环境变量。变量名称不能为空字符串。如果在 environment 字段中定义了变量，那么将使用该值代替父环境的值。如果未定义环境变量，则将其评估为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Environment variables are inherited through the inherits field, and the preset’s environment will be the union of its own environment and the environment from all its parents. If multiple presets in this union define the same variable, the standard rules of inherits are applied. Setting a variable to null causes it to not be set, even if a value was inherited from another preset.
trans-unit.target: 环境变量是通过继承的 inherits 场，预设的环境将自己的工会 environment 和 environment ，从所有的父母。如果此联合中的多个预设定义相同的变量，则将应用 inherits 的标准规则。将变量设置为 null 会导致即使设置值是从另一个预设继承的，也不会设置该变量。

trans-unit.source: Environment variables have global scope in a CMake process. They are never cached.
trans-unit.target: 环境变量在 CMake 进程中具有全局范围。它们从不被缓存。
